Magnus.line: Oh, yes, these mountains. Really great, they are.
Hm? Oh, no. They are truly marvelous, without question. It's just... Well, they do introduce some problems… technical problems, I mean.

Elliot.line: Wait, but Baxter said this airship could withstand this climate...

Magnus.line: Oh, no, it can! No, that's, uh, that's not what I meant. It can definitely endure the voyage. It's just that, well, it makes maintaining it a bit complicated, and the pressure is lower, so that introduces some...

Elliot.line: I-I get it, I get it. You don't need to get into the details.

Magnus.line: Ah, good, sorry. Well, anyway, these mountains are indeed beautiful. So, uh, that's what I have to say about them.
